definitions.definition: Something which corresponds with something else; counterpart .
Someone who communicates with another person, or a publication, by writing.
A journalist who sends reports back to a newspaper or radio or television station from a distant or overseas location.

main_definition: Something which corresponds with something else; counterpart .
secondary_definitions: Someone who communicates with another person, or a publication, by writing.
A journalist who sends reports back to a newspaper or radio or television station from a distant or overseas location.
